entry.title: Ainsley Wins Vanier Award!
entry.content: Congratulations Ainsley for winning the Vanier Canada Graduate Scholarship, one of the most prestigious awards available to doctoral students in Canada, valued at $50,000 per year for three years.
entry.summary: Congratulations Ainsley for winning the Vanier Canada Graduate Scholarship, one of the most prestigious awards available to doctoral students in Canada, valued at $50,000 per year for three years.
